title: CrowdAltitude Precision: Next-Gen Indoor Altitude Detection and Floor Mapping System
product_description: CrowdAltitude Precision leverages crowd-sourced barometric pressure data to deliver accurate indoor altitude and floor-level information for multi-story buildings. It targets emergency responders, facility managers, and augmented reality (AR) developers by enabling precise localization that enhances navigation and safety.
implementation: Using a cloud-based grid mapping algorithm, the system integrates mobile sensor data from devices to compute precise altitude and floor levels. It sends barometric, speed, and location readings to a central server, which applies interpolative techniques and the barometric formula to deliver real-time, accurate indoor localization.
differentiation: CrowdAltitude Precision distinguishes itself with a unique crowd-sourced calibration method that corrects sensor inaccuracies by analyzing device speed and location along with barometric data. This scientific approach surpasses single-device measurements, ensuring robust and reliable indoor mapping precision.
